attributes.review: Upon downloading, it took up more space than warranted, as its owner has done in the White House. Having it for one minute on my phone was more than enough, as one term is enough. Please consider removing this app, as it and it’s creator has no regard for human lives.

attributes.review: I had to buy a new phone because as soon as I opened it my entire phone crashed. When it was finally working again I reopened the app and it happened again. The phone never turned back on. Crappy rigged app.
